Player History
Had first career hit on 4/30/1985, off Danny Jackson (KC)...
Injured on 3/9/1986 with a Bruised Heel, out for 1-2 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/1986, off Rick Sutcliffe (TOR)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/1986, hitting .476 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,542,857 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/18/1987 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/1987, hitting .296 with 6 HR, 10 RBI...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,542,857 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,542,857 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Detroit to Philadelphia on 4/26/1989 (Going to PHI: P Scott Garrelts, SS Austin Manahan, CF Rob Deer. Going to DET: P Steve Bedrosian, P Storm Davis, C Mark Salas)...
5/11/1989: Signed a contract extension with Philadelphia, $1,750,000 per year, for 4 years.
